title: Short-Term Workshop on Strengthening Science and Mathematics Teachers’ Competencies Using PhET Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Need for practice-oriented instructional design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three educational applications of PhET simulations.
Learners can propose lesson design plans utilizing PhET simulations in smartphone environments.
Learners can diagnose their personal technology acceptance (self-efficacy, social influence, etc.) and establish improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
